title: Amulet of power

properties.value: An amulet of power offers a good balance of attack and defence bonuses for all classes of combat. It is created by casting Lvl-4 Enchant on a diamond amulet, and has no requirements to be worn.

Item ID1731

An amulet of power offers a good balance of attack and defence bonuses for all classes of combat. It is created by casting Lvl-4 Enchant on a diamond amulet, and has no requirements to be worn.

This item is a less expensive option for players who do not wish to buy an amulet of glory. However, it lacks teleportation capabilities and has weaker attack and prayer bonuses, it does however have the same strength bonus as well as higher defence bonuses.

This amulet is currently the best overall amulet for F2P players, although the amulet of strength is better in some cases, such as fighting low defence targets with melee.

A helpful way for P2P Ironmen to obtain one is by looting the Ham store room for a diamond amulet, and then enchanting it with 57 Magic.

 Attack bonuses

It is created by casting [[Lvl-4 Enchant]] on a [[diamond amulet]], and has no requirements to be worn. This item is a less expensive option for players who do not wish to buy an [[amulet of glory]]. However, it lacks teleportation capabilities and has weaker attack and [[prayer bonus]]es, it does however have the same strength bonus as well as higher [[defence]] bonuses. This amulet is currently the best overall amulet for F2P players, although the [[amulet of strength]] is better in some cases, such as fighting low defence targets with melee. A helpful way for P2P Ironmen to obtain one is by looting the [[Ham store room]] for a diamond amulet, and then enchanting it with 57 [[Magic]]. {{Infobox Bonuses |astab = +6 |aslash = +6 |acrush = +6 |amagic = +6 |arange = +6 |dstab = +6 |dslash = +6 |dcrush = +6 |dmagic = +6 |drange = +6 |str = +6 |rstr = 0 |mdmg = 0 |prayer = +1 |slot = neck |image = [[File:Diamond amulet equipped.png|130px]] |altimage = [[File:Amulet of power equipped female.png|130px]] }} ==Creation== {{Recipe |skill1 = Magic |skill1lvl = 57 |skill1boostable = Yes |skill1exp = 67 |members = No |ticks = 1 |ticksnote = Manual casting is 3 ticks, auto-casting is 7 ticks |mat1 = Diamond amulet |mat2 = Cosmic rune |mat3 = Earth rune |mat3quantity = 10 |output1 = Amulet of power }} ==Treasure Trails== {{EmoteClueHeader}} {{EmoteClue|tier=medium|emote=Dance|emote2=Blow Kiss|location=Inside [[Lumbridge Swamp Caves]], by the western cave exit|item1=amulet of power|item2=staff of air|item3=bronze full helm}} {{EmoteClue|tier=hard|emote=Salute|location=West side of the [[banana plantation]] in [[Musa Point]]|item1=amulet of power|item2=diamond ring}} {{EmoteClueBottom}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Amulet of power}} ===Shop locations=== {{Store locations list|Amulet of power}} ==Changes== ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Amulet of power detail (beta).png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:Amulet of power detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Amulet of power (beta).png|center]] |[[File:Amulet of power.png|center]] |- |RuneScape 2
